name: 霍弘毅
schedule: In Part B of the Graduate Research Methods course we will focus on intellectual approaches to the study of culture and on academic prose.  The approaches we will study will be Humanism, Psychoanalytic, Post-Structuralism and Deconstruction, Feminism and a discussion of theory in general.  Our chief readings will come from Peter Barry’s Beginning Theory as well as examples from authors he discusses.
